Title: Net-GPT: A LLM-Empowered Man-in-the-Middle Chatbot for Unmanned Aerial Vehicle
Abstract: in the dynamic realm of artificial intelliegence integrating large language models  large language model  with security systems reshape cybersecurity. large language model bolster defense against cyber threats but also introduce risks aiding adver saries in generating malicious content discovering vulnerabilities and distorting perceptions. this paper presents net gpt an large language model empowered offensive chatbot that understands network protocols and launches unmanned aerial vehicles  uav  based man in the middle  mitm  attacks against a hijack communication between uav and ground control stations  gcs . facilitated by an edge server equipped with finely tuned large language model net gpt crafts mimicked network packets between uav and gcs. leveraging the adaptabil ity of popular large language model net gpt produces context aligned network packets. we fine tune and assess net gpt large language model based efficacy showing its impressive generative accuracy  95.3% for llama 2 13b and 94.1% for llama 2 7b. smaller large language model such as distil gpt 2 reach 77.9% predictive capability of llama 2 7b but are 47x faster. cost efficiency tests highlight model quality impact on accuracy while fine tuning data quantity enhances predictability on spe cific metrics. it holds great potential to be used in edge computing environments with amplified computing capability.
